org.bonitasoft.engine.api.permission

Interface PermissionRule


  • public interface PermissionRule
    Class to extend when implementing permission rule to be checked by PermissionAPI
    Author:
    Baptiste Mesta

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isAllowed(APISession apiSession, APICallContext apiCallContext, APIAccessor apiAccessor, Logger logger)
      Called by the engine when using PermissionAPI.checkAPICallWithScript(String, APICallContext, boolean)

    • Method Detail

      • isAllowed

        boolean isAllowed(APISession apiSession,
                APICallContext apiCallContext,
                APIAccessor apiAccessor,
                Logger logger)
        Called by the engine when using PermissionAPI.checkAPICallWithScript(String, APICallContext, boolean)
        Parameters:
        apiSession - the api session from the user doing the api call
        apiCallContext - the context of the api call
        apiAccessor - an accessor to call apis
        logger - a logger that use the engine logger
        Returns:
        true if the user is allowed to access the api or false otherwise
